s0134.literal: Appraisal says: Emperor Ai, from being a feudal king and filling the crown prince's palace, his literary works were broadly perceptive; from youth he had excellent reputation.
s0134.idiomatic: Appraisal: Emperor Ai, from serving as a feudal king and filling the crown prince's palace, possessed broadly perceptive literary works; from youth he had an excellent reputation.

s0135.literal: He observed how in Emperor Cheng's era the hereditary emoluments departed from the imperial house, authority shifted outward; therefore facing the court he executed and censured ministers, desiring to strengthen the ruler's authority, to follow Wu and Xuan.
s0135.idiomatic: He observed that in Emperor Cheng's era, hereditary emoluments had departed from the imperial house and authority had shifted outward. Therefore, facing the court, he executed and censured ministers, desiring to strengthen the ruler's authority and follow Emperors Wu and Xuan.

s0136.literal: His elegant nature disliked music and women; he often viewed archery and martial displays.
s0136.idiomatic: His elegant nature disliked music and women; he often viewed archery and martial displays.
